verses.verse: וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> lifted up יַעֲקֹ֜ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob עֵינָ֗יו <S%H5869><s%> his eyes וַיַּרְא֙ <S%H7200><s%> and looked וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold עֵשָׂ֣ו <S%H6215><s%> and behold Esau בָּ֔א <S%H935><s%> came וְעִמּ֕וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with אַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> and with him four מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men וַיַּ֣חַץ <S%H2673><s%> And he divided אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיְלָדִ֗ים <S%H3206><s%> the children עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> among לֵאָה֙ <S%H3812><s%> unto Leah וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> among רָחֵ֔ל <S%H7354><s%> and unto Rachel וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> among שְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H8147><s%> and unto the two הַשְּׁפָחֽוֹת׃ <S%H8198><s%> handmaids

וַיָּ֧שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> And he put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשְּׁפָח֛וֹת <S%H8198><s%> the handmaids וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יַלְדֵיהֶ֖ן <S%H3206><s%> and their children רִֽאשֹׁנָ֑ה <S%H7223><s%> foremost וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֵאָ֤ה <S%H3812><s%> and Leah וִֽילָדֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H3206><s%> and her children אַחֲרֹנִ֔ים <S%H314><s%> after וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רָחֵ֥ל <S%H7354><s%> and Rachel וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> and Joseph אַחֲרֹנִֽים׃ <S%H314><s%> hindermost

וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> himself עָבַ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> And he passed over לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> before them וַיִּשְׁתַּ֤חוּ <S%H7812><s%> and bowed himself אַ֙רְצָה֙ <S%H776><s%> to the ground שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven פְּעָמִ֔ים <S%H6471><s%> times עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until גִּשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H5066><s%> until he came near עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until אָחִֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> to his brother

וַיָּ֨רָץ <S%H7323><s%> ran עֵשָׂ֤ו <S%H6215><s%> And Esau לִקְרָאתוֹ֙ <S%H7125><s%> to meet him וַֽיְחַבְּקֵ֔הוּ <S%H2263><s%> and embraced וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> him and fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on צַוָּארָ֖ו <S%H6677><s%> on his neck וַׅיִּׅשָּׁׅקֵ֑ׅהׅוּׅ <S%H5401><s%> and kissed him וַיִּבְכּֽוּ׃ <S%H1058><s%> and they wept

וַיִּשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> And he lifted up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינָ֗יו <S%H5869><s%> his eyes וַיַּ֤רְא <S%H7200><s%> and saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנָּשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> the women וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיְלָדִ֔ים <S%H3206><s%> and the children וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> Who [are] those לָּ֑ךְ וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> with thee? And he said הַיְלָדִ֕ים <S%H3206><s%> The children אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom חָנַ֥ן <S%H2603><s%> hath graciously given אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> which God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> thy servant

וַתִּגַּ֧שְׁןָ <S%H5066><s%> came near הַשְּׁפָח֛וֹת <S%H8198><s%> Then the handmaidens הֵ֥נָּה <S%H2007><s%> with וְיַלְדֵיהֶ֖ן <S%H3206><s%> they and their children וַתִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוֶֽיןָ׃ <S%H7812><s%> and they bowed themselves

וַתִּגַּ֧שׁ <S%H5066><s%> came near גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> likewise לֵאָ֛ה <S%H3812><s%> And Leah וִילָדֶ֖יהָ <S%H3206><s%> also with her children וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲו֑וּ <S%H7812><s%> and bowed themselves וְאַחַ֗ר <S%H310><s%> and after נִגַּ֥שׁ <S%H5066><s%> near יוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph וְרָחֵ֖ל <S%H7354><s%> and Rachel וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוֽוּ׃ <S%H7812><s%> and they bowed

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> What לְךָ֛ כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמַּחֲנֶ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> What [meanest] thou by all this drove הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which פָּגָ֑שְׁתִּי <S%H6298><s%> which I met וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> ? And he said לִמְצֹא־ <S%H4672><s%> [These are] to find חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <S%H113><s%> of my lord

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said עֵשָׂ֖ו <S%H6215><s%> And Esau יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> I have לִ֣י רָ֑ב <S%H7227><s%> enough אָחִ֕י <S%H251><s%> my brother יְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> have לְךָ֖ אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what לָֽךְ׃

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob אַל־ <S%H408><s%> No נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> please אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> now מָצָ֤אתִי <S%H4672><s%> Nay I pray thee if now I have found חֵן֙ <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <S%H3947><s%> then receive מִנְחָתִ֖י <S%H4503><s%> my present מִיָּדִ֑י <S%H3027><s%> at my hand כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> after that רָאִ֣יתִי <S%H7200><s%> for therefore I have seen פָנֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thy face כִּרְאֹ֛ת <S%H7200><s%> as though I had seen פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> the face אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God וַתִּרְצֵֽנִי׃ <S%H7521><s%> and thou wast pleased with me

קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> Take נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> Please אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּרְכָתִי֙ <S%H1293><s%> I pray thee my blessing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הֻבָ֣את <S%H935><s%> that is brought לָ֔ךְ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because חַנַּ֥נִי <S%H2603><s%> hath dealt graciously with me אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> to thee because God וְכִ֣י <S%H3588><s%> and because יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> I have לִי־ כֹ֑ל <S%H3605><s%> enough וַיִּפְצַר־ <S%H6484><s%> And he urged בּ֖וֹ וַיִּקָּֽח׃ <S%H3947><s%> him and he took
וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said נִסְעָ֣ה <S%H5265><s%> Let us take our journey וְנֵלֵ֑כָה <S%H1980><s%> and go וְאֵלְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> will go לְנֶגְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5048><s%> before

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him אֲדֹנִ֤י <S%H113><s%> unto him My lord יֹדֵ֙עַ֙ <S%H3045><s%> knoweth כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that הַיְלָדִ֣ים <S%H3206><s%> that the children רַכִּ֔ים <S%H7390><s%> [are] tender וְהַצֹּ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> and the flocks וְהַבָּקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> and herds עָל֣וֹת <S%H5763><s%> with young עָלָ֑י <S%H5921><s%> care וּדְפָקוּם֙ <S%H1849><s%> [are] with me and if men should overdrive י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> them one וָמֵ֖תוּ <S%H4191><s%> will die כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַצֹּֽאן׃ <S%H6629><s%> all the flock

יַעֲבָר־ <S%H5674><s%> I pray thee pass over נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> Please אֲדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> Let my lord לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before עַבְדּ֑וֹ <S%H5650><s%> his servant וַאֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> and I אֶֽתְנָהֲלָ֣ה <S%H5095><s%> and I will lead on לְאִטִּ֗י <S%H328><s%> softly לְרֶ֨גֶל <S%H7272><s%> according as הַמְּלָאכָ֤ה <S%H4399><s%> the cattle אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that לְפָנַי֙ <S%H6440><s%> that goeth before me וּלְרֶ֣גֶל <S%H7272><s%> be able to endure הַיְלָדִ֔ים <S%H3206><s%> and the children עַ֛ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> I אָבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> until I come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> unto my lord שֵׂעִֽירָה׃ <S%H8165><s%> unto Seir

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said עֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> And Esau אַצִּֽיגָה־ <S%H3322><s%> Let me now leave נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Please עִמְּךָ֔ <S%H5973><s%> you מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> with thee [some] of the folk אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתִּ֑י <S%H854><s%> he וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> that [are] with me And he said לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> What זֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> me אֶמְצָא־ <S%H4672><s%> needeth it? let me find חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <S%H113><s%> of my lord
וַיָּשָׁב֩ <S%H7725><s%> returned בַּיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that day הַה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עֵשָׂ֛ו <S%H6215><s%> So Esau לְדַרְכּ֖וֹ <S%H1870><s%> on his way שֵׂעִֽירָה׃ <S%H8165><s%> unto Seir

וְיַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob נָסַ֣ע <S%H5265><s%> journeyed סֻכֹּ֔תָה <S%H5523><s%> to Succoth וַיִּ֥בֶן <S%H1129><s%> and built ל֖וֹ בָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> him an house וּלְמִקְנֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H4735><s%> for his cattle עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> and made סֻכֹּ֔ת <S%H5521><s%> booths עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> after that קָרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> is called שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> therefore the name הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> of the place סֻכּֽוֹת׃ <S%H5523><s%> Succoth ס

וַיָּבֹא֩ <S%H935><s%> came יַעֲקֹ֨ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob שָׁלֵ֜ם <S%H8003><s%> safely עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> a city שְׁכֶ֗ם <S%H7927><s%> of Shechem אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> which [is] in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan בְּבֹא֖וֹ <S%H935><s%> when he came מִפַּדַּ֣ן אֲרָ֑ם <S%H6307><s%> from Padanaram וַיִּ֖חַן <S%H2583><s%> and pitched his tent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> the city

וַיִּ֜קֶן <S%H7069><s%> And he bought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֶלְקַ֣ת <S%H2513><s%> a parcel הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <S%H7704><s%> of a field אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> he נָֽטָה־ <S%H5186><s%> where he had spread שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> in it אָהֳל֔וֹ <S%H168><s%> his tent מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> at the hand בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children חֲמ֖וֹר <S%H2544><s%> of Hamor אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> father שְׁכֶ֑ם <S%H7927><s%> Shechem's בְּמֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> for an hundred קְשִׂיטָֽה׃ <S%H7192><s%> pieces of money

וַיַּצֶּב־ <S%H5324><s%> And he erected שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there מִזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> there an altar וַיִּ֨קְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> and called it ל֔וֹ אֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> God אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> angels יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel ס
